name: COLORON
description:
When the ball is flying through the sky tap a bar and the color will change! But remember, the bar color has to match the ball color! The game was made to  inspire developers to use SVG Animations, ES6 and Flexbox.

Made By:  Ilyas Reese & Designlab Studios

Started: 4/22/18

Finished: 4/24/18

Released: 4/27/18

EVERYTHING IS OWNED BY ILYAS REESE
